attributes.action: Legalise weed for medical or for anyone
attributes.additional_details: It would help others in sleep, epilepsy and more and it would boost the economy it will make others have a happier life than it now with the drugs that get given and weed isn’t a gateway drug it becomes one when you put people in prison and it is a lot safer than most drugs because you can’t die from it no one has died from smoking weed it’s not bad for you as much as Alcohol cigarettes and etc. If you actually researched what does weed to you you’ll know that it’s not bad
attributes.background: That they will take it in fact that the world is changing and why shouldn’t weed be legal they would have a good impact in economy and it will help people who need it to make them feel better
